title: Creamy parsnip and apple soup
description: Sweet parsnips and tangy cooking apples combine perfectly in this deliciously smooth soup. Each serving provides 202kcal, 3.5g protein, 26g carbohydrate (of which 18g sugars), 8g fat (of which 3g saturates), 7.5g fibre and 1.2g salt.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz Bramley apples, peeled, quartered and cut into chunks
1 litre/1Â¾ pints vegetable or chicken stock
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
